author: Danielle Wallace
title: Florida's DeSantis facing mounting pressure to issue statewide stay-at-home order to curb coronavirus cases
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis, a Republican, is facing mounting pressure from Congress to issue a statewide stay-at-home order to curb the rate of infection during the global coronavirus pandemic.
content:
